title: 龟中船，但是完全没有船
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start]]
作者：[[*user RainTree]]

我到底怎么写出这邪门玩意的

大脑发育不完全
小脑完全不发育

部分内容灵感来自群聊和A岛

祝大伙新年快乐

图片来源：
https://pixabay.com/zh/illustrations/flower-twig-corolla-wreath-lease-1973875/
https://pixabay.com/zh/photos/shark-sea-ocean-water-underwater-3347787/
https://pixabay.com/zh/vectors/girl-cute-cold-winter-anime-scarf-160326/
https://pixabay.com/zh/vectors/ribbon-bow-gift-red-ribbon-red-bow-6301267/
https://pixabay.com/zh/vectors/ukraine-flag-national-flag-nation-162450/
https://pixabay.com/zh/vectors/anbu-black-ops-naruto-character-6167247/
https://pixabay.com/zh/illustrations/people-girl-woman-face-portrait-2013447/
其中xolo和homo的头像来自Artbreeder，符合CC-BY-3.0

[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end]]
